translations: n.[解剖] 食管；[解剖] 食道

sentences.sentence: Walking keeps you upright and enlists gravity to keep acids from splashing up the esophagus.
sentences.translation: 散步可以帮助你直立和获得地心重力的作用，去防止胃酸上溅到食道上。

sentences.sentence: The surface of the esophagus was highly rugous.
The esophagus also lies in front of parts of the hemiazygos veins.
sentences.translation: 食道也位于半奇静脉的前面。
